Song.title: Christ Is Risen
Song.copyright: Jeremy Riddle ©2009 Mercy/Vineyard Publishing (ASCAP). Admin. worldwide by Vineyard Music.

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G/B C G/B C G]
Verse 1: C[G/B]ome and s[C]ee, c[G/B]ome and s[C]ee where they la[G]id Him He i[G/B]s not h[C]ere, He i[G/B]s not h[C]ere, He is l[G]iv[D/F#]ing [C]
Chorus 1: Qu[Amin]ickly now go t[C]ell the world Chr[G]ist, the L[Gsus]ord, He is r[Em]isen [C] The p[G]ower of G[Gsus]od, foreve[Em]r raised H[C]im From the gr[G/B]ave[C G/B C G]
Verse 2: W[G/B]here oh de[C]ath? W[G/B]here oh de[C]ath is your st[G Gsus G Gsus]ing? Sw[G/B]allowed u[C]p, you’re sw[G/B]allowed u[C]p in v[G]ict[D/F#]’ry [C]
Chorus 2: Qu[Amin]ickly now go t[C]ell the world Chr[G]ist, the L[Gsus]ord, He is r[Em]isen [C] The p[G]ower of d[Gsus]eath could nev[Em]er hold H[C]im In the gr[G/B]ave [C G/B C G (Alt. Am G/B C)]
Ending: He is r[G]is[Gsus]en, Hallel[G]uj[Gsus]ah He is r[G]is[Gsus]en, Hallel[G]uj[Gsus]ah Hallelu[G]ja[Gsus]h Hallelu[G]ja[Gsus]h Hallelu[G]ja[Gsus]h Hallelu[G]ja[Gsus]h[G C Em C G C Em C G]...
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 come and see come and see where they laid him he is not here he is not here he is living chorus 1 quickly now go tell the world christ the lord he is risen the power of god forever raised him from the grave verse 2 where oh death where oh death is your sting swallowed up youre swallowed up in victry chorus 2 quickly now go tell the world christ the lord he is risen the power of death could never hold him in the grave ending he is risen hallelujah he is risen hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
